title: Pending** Whole house *remodelled* with parking (3+ bd 2ba) Avail 8/15
posting_body: ['** AVAILABLE as early as 8/15/22** (negotiable) Remodelled 3+', 'Bedroom', '(with additional finished attic)', '/2', 'Bath  house in Somerville with off street parking for up to 3 cars (tandem driveway) and a private yard.', 'Location is 5 minute walk to the new Green Line station @', 'Gilman Square.', '3 Full bedrooms on the 2nd floor.', 'Both baths remodeled.', 'In unit front loader laundry units on 1st floor.', 'Large open plan kitchen and living room.', 'Partially furnished in dining and living rooms.', '4th bedroom is on 3rd floor.', 'No AC.', 'High efficiency heating and hot water system (gas) Gas, Electric, wifi utilities to be responsibility of tenants.', 'Water/Sewer/Trash pickup, front sidewalk, porch and driveway snow removal paid by owner.', 'All floors are hardwood.', ', Gas stove, Dishwasher, Microwave, Built-in wall oven.', ' Unfinished basement offers extra storage.', 'Pets negotiable!', 'No broker fee!', 'Pls email for more info and for a private showing.']
